parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: ResourceIdJsonList
parameters.description: The resource IDs in the JSON format.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The effective scope of the blacklist or whitelist. Valid values:

*   GATEWAY
*   DOMAIN
*   ROUTE

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the blacklist.

*   on: enabled
*   off: disabled

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of object in the blacklist or whitelist.
